field.name: body_html
field.p: We hope this email finds you well.
As part of our reference checking process, we are attaching the employee reference check form for {object.ex_employer_1}, who was a former employee at your organization.
Kindly take a moment to fill out the form with the relevant details regarding the candidate in question. Your feedback will be invaluable in our hiring process.
Once completed, please share the filled form with me at your earliest convenience. If you have any questions or require further clarification, please don't hesitate to reach out.
